text: Elliot James LangridgeInformation and Much More from Answers.com (born 5 September 1987) is an English actor, known for the lead roles in Northern Soul (2014),The HeyUGuys Interview and Raindance Best UK Feature Film, We the Kings (2019).Raindance website ==Personal life== Born in Kingston upon Thames, England, Langridge struggled with dyslexia.Interview with Regard Magazine ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
